content: “I would have never run for office, if it wasn’t for the fact that my biggest threat to my company was the federal government and the overreach of the EPA. They’ve gone too far and it’s time for them to be pulled back in,” he added. So let’s see if I got this. You claim that you and you alone are paying your salary because you’ve paid that much in taxes. Excuse me — unless you are paying taxes to the tune of $174,000 per year (and that’s just your paycheck — not your benefits, your expense account, your staff, etc.) more than you are obligated to, that doesn’t wash. And by your own statement, you admit that you ran for this office to serve your personal interests and no one else’s. You know — not even Republicans want to have some self-serving asshole who works only for his own personal selfish interests representing them. I predict you will get primaried in 2018 and you’ll get kicked out. So you’d better take care of your personal selfish interests while you can.
